name: bixschmix
text: Is it sad that my alma mater actually has an AIBO soccer team? Please submit your answers in C   or binary form.

name: bixschmix
text: I am extra lame. It sucks to read back through the comments and realize you're a loser that posted basically the same thing already back in the day.

Have you heard about the university that has soccer-playing AIBOs?

name: stuart
text: They only need to think of 33 new names because you KNOW #1 is Ray Jr.

name: godfatherofsouls
text: My grandfather, Joe, has a little yappy pomeranian by the name of Little Joe. a dynamic duo to say the least.

name: ashoykh
text:
The Dude: You brought the fuckin' Pomeranian bowling?
Walter: What do you mean brought it bowling, Dude? I didn't rent it shoes. I'm not buying it a fucking beer. He's not taking your fucking turn, Dude.
The Dude: Man, if my fuckin' ex-wife asked me to take care of her fuckin' dog while she and her boyfriend went to Honolulu I'd tell her to go fuck herself.

name: tekende
text: This is a fucking show dog with fucking papers, Dude.

name: dovey
text: The first one is named Rutherford. The one he's already got. He received 33 new AIBOS, in addition to the one he already had.

name: salo
text: Half a chubby for the friendly and informative correction of above poster, and the remaining piece of chubby for Joseph Ducreux!

name: selbencoirlo
text: what do you think a man is going to do with half a chubby? you and king solomon was into some twisted shit

name: salo
text: If you two can't get along, I'LL JUST SPLIT THE CHUBBY IN HALF.

text: ugh.  i didnt read all the way down.  apparently someone else posted this comment, and in less creepy way, as well.  talk about lame...

name: stuart
text: I chubbied this when it got posted. I think I made that comment reading the strips out of order.

name: lamewad
text: Sony has to do something with all those AIBOS.

text: aint as if any one is buying them or antything.

name: mastronaut
text: also, "antythings" are apparently things that ants like.

name: lamewad
text:
I can't tell if there was any sarcasm in your comment, so in turn I can't tell if you're agreeing with me or not.
If you were disagreeing:
That was my point... that no one is buying them.
Do you know anyone who owns an AIBO?
If you were agreeing:
Ignore the above completely.

name: mastronaut
text: ignored.

name: stuart
text: I think they'd sort of need to have not stopped producing them due to lack of demand for someone to think people were buying them

name: bixschmix
text: My alma mater participates in a robot soccer league that involves programming AIBO dogs to play against each other. Nerds love those things.

name: spinynorman
text:
That is pretty goddamn sweet.

...wait, how do they stop all the players from periodically sitting and yapping for about 20 seconds?
